languages.text: "Пусть {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}вы больше не носите знаки Арбитес{/d}, но сегодня вы — {mf|мой|моя} {mf|брат|сестра} по оружию. И не только для меня, верно, арбитры?" {n}Отряд Соломона отвечает единым ликующим возгласом, и на миг вам чудится, словно мантия маршала снова лежит на ваших плечах.{/n}

"You may not be {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}wearing the Arbites insignia any longer{/d}, but today, you are my {mf|brother|sister} in arms. And not just mine — isn't that right, Arbitrators?" {n}Solomorne's squad responds with a jubilant roar, and for a moment, you feel as though you are carrying the Marshal's mantle again.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Пусть {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}вы больше не носите знаки Арбитес{/d}, но сегодня вы — {mf|мой|моя} {mf|брат|сестра} по оружию. И не только для меня, верно, арбитры?" {n}Отряд Соломона отвечает единым ликующим возгласом, и на миг вам чудится, словно мантия маршала снова лежит на ваших плечах.{/n}

And not just mine — isn't that right, Arbitrators?" {n}Solomorne's squad responds with a jubilant roar, and for a moment, you feel as though you are carrying the Marshal's mantle again.{/n}

"You may not be {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}wearing the Arbites insignia any longer{/d}, but today, you are my {mf|brother|sister} in arms. And not just mine — isn't that right, Arbitrators?" {n}Solomorne's squad responds with a booming cheer, and for a moment, you feel as though you are carrying the Marshal's mantle again.{/n}

"You may not be {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}wearing the Arbites insignia any longer{/d}, but today, you are my {mf|brother|sister} in arms. And not just mine — isn't that right, Arbitrators?" {n}Solomorne's squad responds with a jubilant roar, and for a moment, you feel as though you are carrying the Marshal's mantle again.{/n}

"You may not be {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}wearing the Arbites insignia any longer{/d}, but today, you are my {mf|brother|sister} in arms. And not just mine — isn't that right, Arbitrators?" {n}Solomorne's squad responds with a jubilant roar, and for a moment, you feel as though you are carrying the Marshal's mantle again.{/n}

languages.text: “或许你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}不再戴着法务部的徽章{/d}，但今天，你就是我的战友。而且，你不仅仅是我一个人的战友。全体法务官，你们说对不对？”{n}索罗蒙的小队爆发出热烈的欢呼声。有那么一瞬间，你感觉自己仿佛再次穿上了元帅的制服。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You may not be {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}wearing the Arbites insignia any longer{/d}, but today, you are my {mf|brother|sister} in arms. And not just mine — isn't that right, Arbitrators?" {n}Solomorne's squad responds with a jubilant roar, and for a moment, you feel as though you are carrying the Marshal's mantle again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “或许你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}不再戴着法务部的徽章{/d}，但今天，你就是我的战友。而且，你不仅仅是我一个人的战友。全体法务官，你们说对不对？”{n}索罗蒙的小队爆发出热烈的欢呼声。有那么一瞬间，你感觉自己仿佛再次穿上了元帅的制服。{/n}

languages.text: 「もう{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}高等裁定局の記章は身に付けていない{/d}かもしれませんが、今日のあなたは私の戦友です。そして私だけの戦友ではない。そうだろう？アービトレイターたちよ」{n}ソロモーンの部隊は歓声をあげて応えた。その瞬間、あなたは再び将帥の重責を担っているかのように感じた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You may not be {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}wearing the Arbites insignia any longer{/d}, but today, you are my {mf|brother|sister} in arms. And not just mine — isn't that right, Arbitrators?" {n}Solomorne's squad responds with a jubilant roar, and for a moment, you feel as though you are carrying the Marshal's mantle again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「もう{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}高等裁定局の記章は身に付けていない{/d}かもしれませんが、今日のあなたは私の戦友です。そして私だけの戦友ではない。そうだろう？アービトレイターたちよ」{n}ソロモーンの部隊は歓声をあげて応えた。その瞬間、あなたは再び将帥の重責を担っているかのように感じた。{/n}

languages.text: «Puede que ya no lleve {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}su insignia del Arbites{/d}, pero hoy es mi compañer{mf|o|a} de armas. Y no solo mí{mf|o|a}, ¿verdad, Arbitrator?». {n}El escuadrón de Solomorne responde con un rugido exultante, y, por un momento, sientes como si volvieras a vestir el manto de Mariscal.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You may not be {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}wearing the Arbites insignia any longer{/d}, but today, you are my {mf|brother|sister} in arms. And not just mine — isn't that right, Arbitrators?" {n}Solomorne's squad responds with a jubilant roar, and for a moment, you feel as though you are carrying the Marshal's mantle again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Puede que ya no lleve {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}su insignia del Arbites{/d}, pero hoy es mi compañer{mf|o|a} de armas. Y no solo mí{mf|o|a}, ¿verdad, Arbitrator?». {n}El escuadrón de Solomorne responde con un rugido exultante, y, por un momento, sientes como si volvieras a vestir el manto de Mariscal.{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr tragt zwar {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}nicht länger die Insignien der Arbites{/d}, aber heute seid Ihr {mf|mein Waffenbruder|meine Waffenschwester}. Und nicht nur {mf|meiner|meine} – ist es nicht so, Arbitratoren?" {n}Solomornes Trupp antwortet mit lautem Jubel, und für einen Augenblick hast du das Gefühl, als würdest du den Mantel des Marschalls wieder tragen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You may not be {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}wearing the Arbites insignia any longer{/d}, but today, you are my {mf|brother|sister} in arms. And not just mine — isn't that right, Arbitrators?" {n}Solomorne's squad responds with a jubilant roar, and for a moment, you feel as though you are carrying the Marshal's mantle again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr tragt zwar {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}nicht länger die Insignien der Arbites{/d}, aber heute seid Ihr {mf|mein Waffenbruder|meine Waffenschwester}. Und nicht nur {mf|meiner|meine} – ist es nicht so, Arbitratoren?" {n}Solomornes Trupp antwortet mit lautem Jubel, und für einen Augenblick hast du das Gefühl, als würdest du den Mantel des Marschalls wieder tragen.{/n}

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Artık Arbites nişanı taşımıyor{/d} olabilirsiniz ama bugün her biriniz benim silah arkadaşımsınız. Üstelik sadece benim de değil, öyle değil mi Yargıcılar?" {n}Solomorne'un mangası, coşkulu bir haykırışla yanıt veriyor. Bir anlığına sanki tekrar Miralay'ın pelerinini üzerinde taşıyormuş gibi hissediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You may not be {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}wearing the Arbites insignia any longer{/d}, but today, you are my {mf|brother|sister} in arms. And not just mine — isn't that right, Arbitrators?" {n}Solomorne's squad responds with a jubilant roar, and for a moment, you feel as though you are carrying the Marshal's mantle again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Artık Arbites nişanı taşımıyor{/d} olabilirsiniz ama bugün her biriniz benim silah arkadaşımsınız. Üstelik sadece benim de değil, öyle değil mi Yargıcılar?" {n}Solomorne'un mangası, coşkulu bir haykırışla yanıt verir ve bir anlığına sanki tekrar Miralay'ın pelerinini üzerinde taşıyormuş gibi hissedersin.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous ne {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}portez peut-être plus l'insigne de l'Arbites{/d}, mais aujourd'hui, vous êtes notre {mf|frère|sœur} d'armes. N'est-ce pas, arbitrators ? » {n}L'escouade de Solomorne pousse un cri d'approbation. En cet instant, vous avez presque l'impression de porter à nouveau le manteau de maréchal.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You may not be {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}wearing the Arbites insignia any longer{/d}, but today, you are my {mf|brother|sister} in arms. And not just mine — isn't that right, Arbitrators?" {n}Solomorne's squad responds with a jubilant roar, and for a moment, you feel as though you are carrying the Marshal's mantle again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}portez peut-être plus l'insigne de l'Arbites{/d}, mais aujourd'hui, vous êtes notre {mf|frère|sœur} d'armes. N'est-ce pas, arbitrators ? » {n}L'escouade de Solomorne pousse un cri d'approbation. En cet instant, vous avez presque l'impression de porter à nouveau le manteau de maréchal.{/n}
